means: 农民的状况、地位或行为

sentence.Network_en: The Russian peasantry stood on the brink of disappearance.
The peasantry has shrunk from 74.6 millions to 65.5.
sentence.Network_cn: 农民人数已从7460万减至6550万.

sentence.Network_en: Here there was still a free small peasantry in addition to colonus.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这里,与隶农并存的,还有自由的小农.

list.abs: In the year 1789 the downtrodden French peasantry turned upon their oppressors ., 1789年 , 被蹂躏的法国农民起来反抗他们的压迫者.
magat peasantry painting has its own peculiar feature in China's peasantry painting .麦盖提农民画是中国农民画中的一支奇葩。
he emphasized political mobilization of the common man , especially the peasantry .他强调对于普通民众的政治动员，尤其是对农民阶级。
什么意思... ... industrious peasantry 勤劳的农民 new peasantry 新型农民 Firelock Peasantry 农民燧枪手.

entry.def: You can refer to all the peasants in a particular country as the peasantry.

example.ex: The Russian peasantry stood on the brink of disappearance.

auth_sentence.content: However, it was not led by the peasantry either.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, it was not led by the peasantry either.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, it was not led by the peasantry either.

auth_sentence.content: The Cambodian left is now in a position to mobilize the peasantry, capitalizing on Sihanouk's personal prestige.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Cambodian left is now in a position to mobilize the peasantry, capitalizing on Sihanouk's personal prestige.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Cambodian left is now in a position to mobilize the peasantry, capitalizing on Sihanouk's personal prestige.

auth_sentence.content: This was because the Kentish peasantry had been able to improve their lot considerably in the wake of the Black Death.
auth_sentence.res_content: This was because the Kentish peasantry had been able to improve their lot considerably in the wake of the Black Death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This was because the Kentish peasantry had been able to improve their lot considerably in the wake of the Black Death.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 集合名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"整体"; 2. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"场地,物等"; 3. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"行业,学科"; 4. 表名词,通常放在一个完整的单词后面,表"状态,性质"

stems_affixes.word_buile: citizen市民,公民+ry整体→n.全体公民
gent绅士,假绅士+ry整体→n.贵族们
peasant农夫,乡下人+ry整体→n.农民[总称]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 铸造,翻砂,铸工厂,玻璃厂,铸造厂
stems_affixes.word_buile: found制造+ry场地,物等→n.铸造,翻砂,铸工厂,玻璃厂,铸造厂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 洗衣房[店];待洗衣物,所洗衣物
stems_affixes.word_buile: laund洗+ry场地,物等→n.洗衣房[店];待洗衣物,所洗衣物
lor+ry场地,物等→n.卡车,铁路货车
quar采石,来自square+ry场地,物等→n.猎物,追求物
pant+ry场地,物等→n.食品柜,餐具室
forest森林+ry行业,学科→n.林产,森林地
husband丈夫+ry行业,学科→丈夫干农活→务农
palmist看手相的人+ry行业,学科→n.相手术
artist艺术家,画家+ry表名词→n.艺术技巧
handit匪徒+ry状态,性质→n.盗贼行为,贼党
mimic模仿者+ry状态,性质→n.模仿,[动物等]拟态伪装
parquet镶木地板+ry状态,性质→n.镶木地板艺术或图案
rival竞争者,对手+ry状态,性质→n.竞争,对抗
